articles.author: Kat Bailey
articles.title: Fortnite Planning to Disable Age-Gated Cosmetic, Reveals v28.00 Update Release Date - IGN
articles.description: Following a backlash over what some fans have called the game's "worst update," Fortnite's developers announced plans to disable age-gating for most cosmetics and skins while revealing that version 28.00 will be released on December 3.
articles.content: Fortnite is disabling its controversial age restrictions over cosmetics, which fans have criticized as one of the game's "worst updates." In a message on its website, Fortnite's developers announced … [+2095 chars]
